title: BHEL secures Rs 11,000 cr contract for three supercritical power projects from Adani Power
description: Bharat Heavy Electricals Limited (BHEL) announced a contract with AdPower Limited (APL) and its subsidiary Mahan Energen Limited (MEL) for developing three Supercritical Thermal Power projects worth over Rs 11000 crore, excluding GST. The agreement, signed on Sunday, entails the supply of critical equipment and supervision of the erection and commissioning processes for the projects.
